content:
Hi.
we've about 700 end-users, who do not have admin rights under windows desktops.
But, I didn't find a way to make a massive deployment with settings:

  • default domain
  • streams settings
  • corporate logo
  • ans so on ....

I wanted to export windows client's settings, to make, a msi package, but I don't find a way to do that.
Can you please help me to make a massive deployment on windows/android with corporate settings?
thanks a lot for your helps.

ps : is that posssible to take control of client's side update? I'd like to push update after I validate on my labs and some beta users.

@lne we're definitely happy to help with this sort of thing; you should consider getting a support contract since that sounds like a lot of customization in different places (E.g. stream settings are a server-side setting; default domain would be client-side).

Tim Abbott said:

lne we're definitely happy to help with this sort of thing; you should consider getting a support contract since that sounds like a lot of customization in different places (E.g. stream settings are a server-side setting; default domain would be client-side).

ok, thanks for your answer, I real appreciated. We are at very beginning of the project, and I will summit this kind of consideration.
